titles.title: Native American Health Savings Improvement Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit individuals eligible for Indian Health Service assistance to qualify for health savings accounts.
Native American Health Savings Improvement Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Native American Health Savings Improvement Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to specify that receiving hospital care or medical services under a medical care program of the Indian Health Service or a tribal organization does not disqualify an individual from being eligible for a health savings account.
